clinical_history: Patient with bone pain and prior cancer history.
findings: Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
Focal increased uptake in bone marrow, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
Focal uptake in bone marrow consistent with post-surgical changes.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
recommendations: Repeat PET-CT in 3–6 months to monitor treatment response.
